summary: This document is a Wells Fargo secure email notification regarding a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) filing related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It appears to be a forwarding notification from July 9, 2020, concerning financial monitoring activity.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the subject of a Wells Fargo Suspicious Activity Report filing mentioned in the email notification.

events.title: Wells Fargo SAR filing regarding Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Wells Fargo files or forwards a Suspicious Activity Report related to Ghislaine Maxwell, triggering a secure email notification.

keyFacts: Wells Fargo filed or was involved with a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
The SAR filing notification was sent via secure email on July 9, 2020.
The document is a secure email notification from Wells Fargo's email security system, indicating financial monitoring activity.
